description: Blaby District Council officials said works are required at the park entrance.
title: Blaby: Car park to close shut again for 'essential' works
title_page: Blaby: Car park  to close shut again for 'essential' works - BBC News
maintext:
A car park in a Leicestershire town is to close again while more work is carried out, a council has said.
The car park at Bouskell Park, in Blaby, was shut in October and reopened in January, following a refurbishment, with new parking charges.
Blaby District Council said it would be closed again from Wednesday until Tuesday, 11 March.
The authority said more work was needed at the park's entrance along with resurfacing on Welford Road.
